welcome:
Let's play Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock which is an expanded version
   of the traditional game of Rock, Paper, Scissors.
winner: First one to win 5 games is the champion!
gameChoice: Please choose r for rock, p for paper, sc for scissors, l for lizard or sp for spock:
anotherGame: Would you like to play again (y/n) or see the game history (h)?
